live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
57191.summary: Some customers in Pitt Meadows are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57191.title: Jan 22 - Pitt Meadows | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience. A further update will be provided by 2:19 PM MT
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
